replies.body: i know this is ironic, here goes. i like reading this but i don't particularly enjoy posting. it would be nice if there were a 'like' button or something or that sort. idk why but i feel like i do my part when i 'like' it. i feel these players don't get the support they deserve (myself included) and i like to think my pressing the like button helps them in some way even if it doesn't, maybe just know their jokes aren't going wasted.
I logged in just to give you an upvote. Never done *that* before! Hope you feel validated ;)
You should tweet the link or something and tag it with #IAMOPL so the whole world knows!

Well said. As a rather minor region anyway, we do need to be a little more active in our support of these guys, even if it's just little things like this.

Also logged in for first time to upvote and comment luls
HAHAHAH i love chelby's picture so much.

You wats the funniest part about this whole thing?
It's not a boy reporting, (which is (in a way) not normal).
Also I dont think enough girls play this game to even see this report.
No offence to women, if u think im being sexist

I am a girl and I im reading and posting :O meta break overload.. lol
plus spookz has a girlfriend that plays too and she's diamond :O le gasp!!
Just about every bf that plays LoL, their gf's play this game also, so it's not really surprising if Spookz's gf plays the game :P
Plenty of girls play, including myself.. :/

But how many girls do you know personally that would play this type of game?
(Do keep in mind that they're NOT Asian / White, because they're obviously gonna play this).
And also i do know wat u chicks r getting at, i hav a friend (girl) who plays the game, who's Samoan. She likes the game :D
But not many girls that are my nationality (Samoan) play this game, cause they're out and about either:

- Playing Rugby
- Watching Rugby
- Betting on Rugby
- Doing / watching other sports
you have got to be joking!!...who cares!!!
le gorgeous le gamers von delicious
I thought only half the questions was valid.  But humor is ok.  I hoped for more incite into strategy!
Love all the jokes being thrown in, though don't think OPL needs any more of those.
